TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeLibVersionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TypeLibVersionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TypeLibVersionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定匯出型別程式庫的版本號碼。

span.span: Specifies the version number of an exported type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至組件。You can apply this attribute to assemblies. 根據預設， [Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)產生類型程式庫版本從組件版本的前兩個數字。By default, the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) generates a type library version from the first two numbers of an assembly version. 例如，Tlb.exe 匯出成組件版本 1.2.5000.0 型別程式庫版本 1.2，排除組件的組建和修訂編號。For example, Tlb.exe exports assembly version 1.2.5000.0 as a type library version 1.2, eliminating the build and revision numbers of the assembly. 如果不需要這個行為，您可以控制的類型程式庫號碼產生明確套用。If this behavior is undesirable, you can control the generation of the type library number explicitly by applying the . 會很有用時兩個組件版本會產生相同的型別程式庫版本，明確地控制產生的型別程式庫版本。It is useful to control the generation of a type library version explicitly when two assembly versions produce the same type library version. 例如，組件版本 1.2.0.0 和組件版本 1.2.500.0 都會產生類型程式庫版本 1.2，可能會造成問題，當您解除安裝其中一個組件。For example, assembly version 1.2.0.0 and assembly version 1.2.500.0 both produce a type library version of 1.2, which can cause problems when you uninstall one of the assemblies. 若要區分型別程式庫版本，您可以強制第二個組件 （版本 1.2.500.0） 來產生 1.25 型別程式庫版本。To differentiate the type library versions, you can force the second assembly (version 1.2.500.0) to produce a type library version of 1.25. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用設明確的類型程式庫版本 1.25。The following example shows how to apply the to explicitly set the type library version to 1.25. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibVersionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.typelibversionattribute/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibVersionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.typelibversionattribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibVersionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.typelibversionattribute/vb/source.vb#1)]
